SinCellApp
Single-cell Datasets Apps

Datasets

About

This website is a portal where I deploy all datasets that I had analyzed. I'm using public and private datasets. Analysis were made using Seurat, Monocle2 and other R packages. Website/apps were built using RShiny package.

If you need an information from already published or your own private dataset, you can send me an e-mail on the script below. Collaborations are always welcome!

Contact Me
